structure.unit: Sec. 8-2003. - REPLACEMENT OF WATER OR SEWER SERVICE STUBS.

law.catch_line: REPLACEMENT OF WATER OR SEWER SERVICE STUBS.
law.text: In the event of the paving or widening of streets, or the raising or lowering of the grade of a street, or in the installation of curbs or gutters and/or sidewalks, or in the case of the installation of new water or sewer lines initiated by the public, all water and sewer service stubs may be replaced so as to meet the standards prescribed by the City plumbing code. There shall be no charge for such replacements. (Code 1959 , ยง23-10; Ord. No. 1985-543, ยง2, 4-16-85)
